entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as mopping up Bill's wounds with a curious expression on her face.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as having wounds that Fleur is tending to.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is described as suggesting lending a tiara to Harry for the wedding.

entities.name: great auntie muriel
entities.description: Great Auntie Muriel is mentioned as having a goblin-made tiara that Mrs Weasley wants to lend to Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking stunned along with Harry.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as exchanging startled looks with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as exchanging startled looks with Ginny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage.

relationships.description: Mrs Weasley suggests lending Great Auntie Muriel's tiara to Harry for the wedding.
Fleur is tending to Bill's wounds.
Mrs Weasley offers to lend Great Auntie Muriel's tiara to Harry for the wedding.
Fleur accepts Mrs Weasley's offer of lending a tiara to Harry.
Mrs Weasley mentions that Great Auntie Muriel is fond of Bill.
Fleur and Mrs Weasley hug each other after Fleur accepts the offer of a tiara.
Ron is described as looking stunned along with Harry.
Ginny and Hermione exchange startled looks.
